Constructor Detail

Articles

public Articles()
Method Detail

index

public static void index()
Index of the /articles/ path. Show a summary of what we've got in the database and some useful links in a "homepage" view. URL: /articles/ OR /articles/index Gives to template: - Long count_all: number of articles in the database - Long count_week: number of new articles added this week Rendering: HTML

list

public static void list()
Show a paginated list of all the articles in the database, as a table sorted by date desc (newer to older). URL: /articles/list Gives to template: - ModelPaginator articles: a paginated list of Article objects. Rendering: HTML

mobilized

public static void mobilized(java.lang.Long id)
Show the mobilized version of the given article. URL: /articles/mobilized?id={param}

Parameters:
id - The id of the article to load. Gives to template: - Article fulltext field, a String containing raw HTML. Rendering: HTML

week

public static void week()
Show articles of the week (starting on monday). URL: /articles/week Gives to template: - List of Article objects, sorted by publishedAt desc. Rendering: HTML

rss

public static void rss()
Publish a RSS 2.0 feed of the last articles. This method uses 2 global variables, defined in the app configuration file : - social.rss.enable: wether to enable or not the rss feed (if not, calling this page will redirect to index) ; - social.rss.count: the number of items to include in the feed. Gives to template: - List of Article objects. Rendering: RSS 2.0 feed (XML)

cite

public static void cite(java.lang.Long id)
Toggle the cited state of the given article.

Parameters:
id: - the id of the Article to load. Gives to template: - Article object. Rendering: AJAX HTML
